content.rendered:
RSI LC 79 TRAY & CANOPY

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

Loaded with Smart innovation, RSI canopies are raising the industry benchmark for automotive manufacturing.

The RSI Tray Canopy is versatile, rugged and designed for the most adventurous. From its inception it have been  designed for over-landing, camping and off road exploration.

RSI Ute Tray CANOPIES  areergonomically designed to ensure your tools or recreational gear is readily available.  Superior access  is gained from the large side doors. The internal space can be equipped  with a range of storage solutions such as: Fridge slides, Draws and shelving.

Derived from extensive testing and customer feedback, we have listened to our customers requests throughout the build process. To eliminate unwanted wind drag the canopies roofline is  aerodynamic promotes excellent fuel efficiency.

Many of our customers are business owners and realise their vehicle is a reflection of the quality of their brand name. Here at RSI Australia we set out to design a sleek looking ute canopy that makes you proud of you vehicle as a workhorse or a daily driver.

DIMENSIONS

Ute Tray & Canopy:

1800mm Long x 1800mm Wide x 900H

Tray Weight: 215 KG 

Canopy Weight: 120 KG 

Package Inclusions 

RSI SMART TRAY 

  • LED Tail Lights
  • Weather Sealed Trundle Drawer
  • 2K Aerocure Automotive Paint Finish
  • Under Tray Storage boxes (Behind Wheels)
  • Rear Window Mesh Protection
  • LED Number Plate Lights
  • External Lashing Points

RSI TRAY CANOPY 

  • 409 Automotive Stainless Steel
  • Matte Black Automotive Paint
  • 2 x Large Gull Wing Doors
  • Automotive Seals
  • Compression T-handle Locks
  • Sleek Design

TOTAL PACKAGE PRICE 

Land Cruiser 79 From $15,680  inc GST 

Click here to view the entire range of RSI LC79 Tray & Canopy available!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!

 

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
